name: Crazy Miner - Puzzle Line
description:
The hamster is a miner. Now you need your help. Draw the same route on the ground according to the map, so that the hamster can quickly find the ore.
Pull any line segment and fix it to a point, thus dividing it into two new lines, and the new lines can continue to divide. Such repetition, a few ordinary lines can weave a myriad of fantastic graphics, some of which seem complex but full of regularity.
